gridContents.title: Roderick Cox
gridContents.explanation: In Berlin, Stephanie d’Arc Taylor meets the man who makes music move—orchestra conductor Roderick Cox.

gridContents.title: Marion Motion
gridContents.explanation: In the 1990s, Marion Motin swapped ballet classes for hip-hop battlegrounds in the Parisian banlieues. The celebrated choreographer talks to Daphnée Denis about her guiding belief in “immediate movement”—and why touring with Madonna almost broke her.
